wikipedia_page.main: John Barry Williamson (born 3 March 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender. He made one appearance in the Football League Second Division for Burnley, coming on as a substitute in the 4–3 win over Macclesfield Town on 28 March 1999.
